imdb.title: Tenchi Muyô! GXP
imdb.plot: The misadventures of Tenchi's unlucky nephew.

episodes.title: Seize The Day
episodes.plot: Seina is a lovesick high school student with the worst luck imaginable. Every step he takes is a disaster waiting to happen, but a chance encounter with a beautiful space babe is about to change his life forever!

episodes.title: Police and Pirates
episodes.plot: Seina's head is still spinning after being recruited by the Galaxy Police, and an outrageous run-in with a band of space pirates doesn't do much to set his mind at ease!

episodes.title: The Devil Princess of Jurai
episodes.plot: Seina's talent for finding trouble makes him a hot commodity, and he is forced to choose between a life serving the Galaxy Police - or joining forces with a notorious and beautiful space pirate!

episodes.title: Fog of Confusion, Unfallen Rain
episodes.plot: Upon his arrival at the Galaxy Police academy, Seina is forced to go through immigration, where he runs into a familiar face from his life on Earth.

episodes.title: Sweet Traps in Darkness
episodes.plot: Seina and his friends sneak out after curfew for a little late night action, but when a pretty girl turns out to be a hologram, the boys end up as subjects in some very private experimentation!

episodes.title: Entering the GP Academy
episodes.plot: Day one of the academy proves tougher than Seina ever imagined. A nasty professor with a mean anti-human streak is determined to run him into the ground, and Seina won't last long without some physical upgrades!

episodes.title: Living Together
episodes.plot: After Seina's body enhancement, Amane moves him out of the dorm into her house to give him some individual training. Seina also learns that Erma and Kiriko will be his roommates.

episodes.title: Days of Cohabitation
episodes.plot: Seina's extra special training with Amane leaves him hot and bothered - and drives the other roommates crazy with jealousy. A surprise visit from Amane's parents only adds to the hilarity!

episodes.title: A Stormy Space Training Cruise
episodes.plot: After finally getting his body back under control, Seina receives his first academy assignment! Unfortunately, his mission is interrupted by the arrival of space pirates!

episodes.title: Baptism
episodes.plot: The academy decides to utilize Seina's special skills and use the boy as bait. The situation goes from bad to worse when space pirates attack and Seina is left with only a mop for protection.

episodes.title: First Paychecks and Presents
episodes.plot: Seina heads straight to the mall after receiving his first paycheck, but when his shopping partner turns out to be an assassin, he might not live long enough to spend his hard-earned money!

episodes.title: Kamidake Wounded
episodes.plot: Seina's very important delivery mission is interrupted by the repeated arrival of space pirates! As if that weren't bad enough, his crew is starving and his space ship is broken!

episodes.title: On Jurai
episodes.plot: While they wait for their space ship to be repaired, Kiriko, Amane, and Ryoko soak their bodies in the hot springs and argue over which one of them gets to wash Seina's back!

episodes.title: A Strong Little Enemy Appears
episodes.plot: Neju, a mysterious girl with green hair, is spending too much one-on-one time with Seina, so Kiriko, Amane, and Ryoko don revealing bathing suits to show their man what a real woman looks like!

episodes.title: Fuku-Chan, Runaway
episodes.plot: Fuku can't handle the stress of combat, so the girls come up with an alternative method of navigating the ship. But when things don't go exactly as planned, the fretting fur ball must save the day!

episodes.title: Homecoming
episodes.plot: Seina and his friends use some much-needed vacation time to pay a visit to Earth! Will the unlucky boy be stricken homesick - or realize that you really can't go back again?

episodes.title: Seina and Tenchi
episodes.plot: Seina continues his Earthly vacation by paying a visit to his old friend Tenchi in an attempt to finally get some answers about Fuku's origins.

episodes.title: Those Who Seize Good Fortune
episodes.plot: When a group of pirates known as the Good Luck Fleet terrorizes the galaxy, Seina is called in to stop them in their tracks. Unfortunately, he gets distracted by Amane's sunbathing!

episodes.title: Show
episodes.plot: After their ship is badly damaged during an attack by Seiryo, Amane returns to the runway for a one-time only modeling engagement!

episodes.title: The Ship That Brings Good Luck
episodes.plot: Seiryo christens his ship with an unfortunate name, Seina runs from a group of gorgeous girls, and Kiriko faces a difficult choice concerning her future.

episodes.title: Introduction, Development, and Conclusion
episodes.plot: Kiriko's ship merges with Seina's Kamidake II to create an even more powerful ship. On their first mission to find Seiryo's ship, they find the secret hideout of the Daluma Pirate Guild.

episodes.title: Duel of Fortune and Misfortune
episodes.plot: Plans for a unified galactic alliance are put on hold until Seiryo's pirate shenanigans can be brought to an end. Looks like it's time for Seina and his arch nemesis to settle their differences with a duel!

episodes.title: Chase
episodes.plot: Seina mounts a rescue mission after his ship is commandeered and his crew is arrested, but the clumsy hero quickly finds himself marooned on a distant planet.

episodes.title: Parallel... Trouble
episodes.plot: Thinks look bleak for Seina and his new friends until the discovery of an ancient and powerful weapon. Seina has the power to operate the giant robot, but can it overcome his unnaturally bad luck?

episodes.title: Graduation
episodes.plot: Seina prepares for his graduation amidst rumors that the Galaxy Police may reform his old unit. Will his female comrades come along for the ride?

episodes.title: Marriage Vows on the Moon
episodes.plot: Seina is set to wed his four beautiful comrades, but before he can walk down the aisle, the groom-to-be is kidnapped by four more gorgeous girls!
